title: JR. ONE BEDROOM ONE BATH
map_address: E TEMPLE AVE near E AMAR AVE
posting_body: ['Building Our Future One Resident At A Time', 'Our office is now open to the public for in-person and virtual tours of our wonderful units.', 'All applications will take place online at:', '<URL>', 'Select a floor plan and unit and then start your application!', 'Welcome to Woodside Village!', 'We are centrally located near the 10, 60, 605 and 57 freeways in the heart of the San Gabriel Valley.', 'Two shopping centers are within walking distance and Westfield Mall and recreational facilities are only a few miles away.', 'We are also located near the Big League Field of Dreams.', 'Our amenities include 2 sparkling pools and a spa, 5 laundry rooms conveniently located throughout the property, designated parking, well maintained grounds and facilities, monthly community events, courtesy patrol, and more!', 'Our friendly, professional staff is here for you 7 days a week!', '**Pricing is subject to change daily.', 'Pricing quoted in this posting is for today only for that specific unit on a 14-month lease.', '**', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 600 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- This 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom unit features a more open floor plan with the areas flowing together.', 'From the front door you enter the living area, with the dining and kitchen to the side.', 'The large windows and sliding glass door to the patio offer ample natural light.', 'The kitchen features reglazed counters,', '4- burner electric stove, dishwasher, plenty of cabinet storage and a stainless-steel sink.', 'Through the living area is the bedroom and bathroom, it has two separate closets with the sink vanity in between and the bath area having a separate room.', 'Community Amenities', '- Extra Storage', '- Five Floor plans to Choose From', '- Public Transportation', '- Covered Lot', '- Online payments at <URL>', '- 24 Hr. Emergency Maintenance', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Laundry Facility', '- Disability Access', '- Vertical Blinds', '- Freeway Access', '- Relaxing Spa', '- Courtyard', '- Two Sparkling Pools', '- Patios & Balconies', '- Courtesy patrol', '- Studios, 1 & 2 Bedrooms', '- Large Closets and Cabinets', '- Extra parking available for rent', 'Pet Policy', 'We accept both dogs and cats with no weight restrictions, but with some dog breed restrictions.', 'Deposits are $500 per dog and $250 per cat and Pet Rents are $50 per dog per month and $25 per cat per month.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Your gross monthly income must be at least two and a half (2.5) times the monthly rent.', 'Driving Directions', 'Traveling on CA I-10 take exit CA-39 S/S Azusa Ave and travel south.', 'Turn left onto E Amar Road and then a right onto Temple Avenue and our leasing office will be on the right hand side.', 'Traveling on CA I-60 take exit CA-39 N/N Azusa and travel north.', 'Turn right onto Temple Avenue and our Leasing office is on the left hand side.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Sunday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Woodside Village Apartments', '2547 East Temple Ave, West Covina, CA, 91792', 'VxoA0DjCkU6a']
